content: **crochet seating pad with star pattern in 2 strands drops eskimo ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern ee-695 yarn group e + e or f ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** piece measures approx 42 cm in diameter **materials** drops eskimo from garnstudio belongs to yarn group e 300 g colour 30 pastel pink 300 g colour 36 amethyst **crochet gauge ** 7 5 half treble crochets in width with 2 strands = 10 cm for information the 3 first rounds measure approx 12 cm in diameter crochet hook drops crochet hook size 10 mm hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
